This means that gospel is to the left of rock, and rock is to the left of folk.

5. The fan of house is in an odd position.
This means that house is in positions 1, 3, or 5.

6. The fan of house is on the left or right of the fan of folk.
This means that house is adjacent to folk, which we already know.

#############

| Music-Genre   |      |        |      |      |       |       |

| Rock          | 2    |        |      |      |       |       |

The final solution is:

Gospel - Rock - Folk - House - Disco - Soul

Note that the fan of house is in an odd position (position 4), and the fan of house is adjacent to the fan of folk (position 3).
